tasks.description: Retrieve a dataset of travel destinations (cities, beaches, national parks, cultural sites) including names, categories, and latitude/longitude.
Supply the retrieved data to an interactive mapping component, enabling marker placement, pop‑ups, and basic filtering on the client side.
Enable users to click or hover on a marker to view a pop‑up containing destination highlights, photos, and further details.
Generate an overview summary (text or visual) of top travel highlights based on selected filters.
Collect and send interaction metrics for analytic insight
Allow interactivity: filtering by category, sorting by rank, and displaying pop‑ups with post details.
Collect raw performance data from a target website (e.g., response times, bytes transferred, caching headers).
Analyze the collected data to compute grades for performance, usability, and overall quality, and identify areas for improvement.
Compile the analysis into a structured report format, including summaries, graphs, and actionable recommendations.
Present the report data in a user-friendly interface or integrate it into another application.
Store or expose the generated report via a RESTful endpoint for retrieval or further processing.
Format the collected metrics and grades into a user-friendly report format (HTML/JSON)

Call Fitbit API endpoints to fetch daily activity summary or step count
Persist the retrieved activity data in a local or cloud database

Send notifications/reminders to users based on activity thresholds

Compute final scores and rankings based on timing data
Generate downloadable reports and display real‑time results on AXti.me dashboards

Confirm successful upload and handle errors
Send email notifications to stakeholders after successful data upload.

Create exportable reports (PDF/CSV) summarizing the selected ocean data for download
Fetch real-time website traffic data (visitors, page views, referrers) for a specified domain.
Compute a website valuation score using traffic statistics, engagement metrics, and comparison benchmarks.
Produce aggregated ad performance reports, including metrics breakdown by campaign, ad group, keyword, and geographic location.
Build dashboards and generate reports summarizing traffic, valuation, and advertising performance.
Correlate the performance data with traffic/valuation metrics to identify performance-impact on value.

Like or unlike a specific pin.
Design and store a subscription form schema (fields, appearance, validation settings)
Generate an embeddable script or HTML snippet that website owners can paste into their site
Store and expose captured lead data, optionally push new leads to a Constant Contact mailing list

Track submission counts and optionally display analytics to the user.
Manage the storage, privacy, and export of collected lead data.
Offer basic lead capture metrics (e.g., number of leads, conversion rate).
Search and retrieve a list of adventure and activity businesses based on user query (location, activity type, dates).
Fetch aggregated reviews, overall ratings and customer feedback for each listed business.
Identify and display current daily deals or promotions applicable to each business.
Create, confirm, and store a reservation/booking made by the user including payment handling.
Display relevant deals within the app via dynamic advertising units.
Provide directions or travel time estimates from the user's location to the business.
Validate and geocode the user-provided Australian address.
Query the Sensis Yellow Pages API to obtain a list of pubs near the address.
For each pub, call the Yelp API to fetch the latest reviews and reviewer photos.
Aggregate the data and format a combined response for the client.
Render the merged pub list with photos and details for the user to view in the application.
Provide the merged result set via an API endpoint or embed it in a web/mobile UI.

Post the retrieved forecast as a tweet to the @MalvaWeather Twitter account.
Request weather forecast information for the obtained coordinates.

Submit the formatted tweet to Twitter on behalf of @MalvaWeather.
Post the formatted tweet to the @MalvaWeather account

Render the parcel location on a Google Maps interface, updating position in real time as new tracking data becomes available.

Render the obtained location data on a Google Maps widget, providing a visual representation of the parcel’s journey.

Query flight catalogs from multiple airline APIs to obtain ticket prices, schedules, and availability.

Retrieve current bus locations, routes, and stops from the CTA data feed.
